text: Episode title screen of Series Two Episode 3 "Occurrence at the Agricultural Festival" ("Seonnongjeeseo Saenggin Il" 선농제에서 생긴 일) This is a list of episodes for the MBC animated television series Jang Geum's Dream. == Series 1 == The DVD box set contains subtitles in Korean, English, and Japanese, including episode titles. The Japanese episode titles subtitles differ from NHK's episode titles. The NHK titles are listed below. No official English translations are available for the NHK episode titles. {| class="wikitable" |- !
